svcproc.title: OUTPUT ROLLERSHAFT ADJUSTING SCREW
svcproc.para: If the end play of the assembled rollershaft adjusting screw exceeds .008 inch (0.20 mm), unstake adjusting screw threaded retainer, replace adjusting screw, thrust washer and threaded retainer, and adjust to .001 to .003 inch (0.03 to 0.08 mm) end play. Carefully stake (2 places) the outer flange of new threaded adjusting screw retainer, using a suitable punch, into the slots on the end of the roller shaft.

note.para: Service output rollershaft assembly includes adjusting screw thrust washer and retainer.

Excess end play of the adjusting screw will be noticeable when making total mesh preload adjustment as the turning torque will be uneven (left to right/right to left) when turning gear across center or straight ahead position.
